analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x9cbe0f7819d479653265c9507654e3cbe80e682e.sol:
	Contract BanzaiCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cbe0f7819d479653265c9507654e3cbe80e682e.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x9cbe0f7819d479653265c9507654e3cbe80e682e.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
